typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		transcode as string,
		timestamp as string,
		tsDateTime as string,
		indexToken as string,
		currentIndexValue as string,
		highIndexValue as string,
		lowIndexValue as string,
		percentageChangeInIndex as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
